job_description:
• Juris Doctor degree and admitted to practice in at least one U.
• At least 5 years combined legal experience in a law firm and/or in-house legal department (preferably in the software, technology, or government contracting fields).
• Commercial agreement / license drafting, review, negotiation, and analysis experience or contract litigation experience.
• Experience and expertise in government contracts law (federal, state, and local), including but not limited to the FAR, DFARS, commercial item rules under the FAR (and agency acquisition supplements), and knowledge of prominent contract vehicles such as the GSA Schedule and state-wide acquisition vehicles.
• Discernment and experience, with the ability to understand the company’s business and anticipate the nature and magnitude of issues that could arise in various settings.

• Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with internal clients and external customers.

• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
